title: Chicken Tacos
author: Elizabeth
instructions:
1. dice chicken breast
2. dice onion
 3. dice cilantro
4. dice tomato
 5. add salt to the chicken
6. fry the chicken for 5 minutes
7. heat up tortillas
8. once chicken is cooked and tortillas are heated, add chicken into the tortillas with cilantro, onion, and tomato
